body.name: LivTee Blind Spot Mirror, 2" Round HD Glass Frameless Convex Rear View Mirrors Exterior Accessories with Wide Angle Adjustable Stick for Car SUV and Trucks, Pack of 2
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 2 hrs 30 mins
features: 【360 Degree】2 pieces packaged, newest upgrade 360 degree rotate and sway adjustable, maximize your view with wide angle in car. All convex spot mirrors are equipped with tiny adjustable swivel mounting bracket for easy installation.
【More Safety】Convex mirrors increase safety by eliminating blind spots for safer driving when passing and changing lanes on any road. Perfect for any Car, Van, SUV and Trucks.
【HD Glass】Our 2" HD Glass Curved Blindspot Mirrors is frameless and has a slim design, IP65 waterproof, rust resistant, Convex ultra thin HD glass, no haze rear view side mirror.
【Easy to install】Please clean your original car side mirrors, then stick blind spot mirrors to the mounting bracket and install them on side rear view mirrors.
【Service Guarantee】Any issues or questions please feel free to contact us, we are always here to satisfy all of you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have item for car!
reviews.reviewText: I can't believe I've been driving without this blind spot mirror for so long! It's a total game-changer for road safety. The installation was a breeze, and it stuck securely to my side mirror. Once in place, it significantly improved my visibility, especially when changing lanes or merging onto highways.The wide-angle view it provides is fantastic – I can see vehicles in my blind spot clearly, which gives me peace of mind while driving. What I appreciate most is its durability; it has stayed put through all sorts of weather conditions, from scorching heat to heavy rain.This little mirror has made me a more confident and safer driver, and I wouldn't want to be without it. If you're looking to enhance your driving experience and safety, I highly recommend adding a blind spot mirror like this to your vehicle. It's a small investment that makes a big difference!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looking for blind slot mirrors? Look no further.
reviews.reviewText: TL;DR @ the bottom.Alright, so I bought a 2017 Honda Accord EX-L V6. This car is pretty nice except for the fact the rearview mirrors aren't wide enough. Sure you have the blind spot camera on the right rearview mirror but not the left. Regardless there's quite a big blind spot especially on the left. I've been honked at several times when merging left thinking it was clear (clearly wasn't). I could have saved money and got the trim with blind spot monitoring but who needs that? Evidently I do but it's too late so I bought this product instead and it has worked spectacularly well for the last year and 3 months I've had it on my rearview mirrors. These mirrors have yet to fall off. They're ridiculously easy to install and perfect for the price. It even comes with little swivels if you want more precise fine tuned adjustment on your mirrors. Ever since I installed these I haven't had to look over my left shoulder like death is following me. Merging became a breeze. These even stayed glued on through numerous drive thru car washes. I'd buy these for my next vehicle but I purchased a Honda so I'll probably grow old in it.TL;DR: THESE STICK, DON'T FALL OFF FROM WASHES, HAVE GREAT VISIBILITY, AND THEY NEARLY LOOK OEM.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Essential Blind Spot Mirrors for Enhanced Driving Safety
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the opportunity to acquire a set of blind spot mirrors for my 2017 Chevy Volt, and I'm genuinely pleased with the transformative impact they've had on my overall driving experience. My primary purpose for purchasing these mirrors was to enhance visibility and driving safety, and I'm delighted to report that they have excelled in both areas.I found the adjustable nature of these blind spot mirrors particularly satisfying. Being able to fine-tune their positioning allowed me to customize my field of vision precisely, significantly reducing the common problem of blind spots. Now, vehicles that were previously obscured are easily visible in the enhanced, convex view these mirrors provide.Furthermore, I appreciate that these mirrors have a clean, uncluttered design. There is no distracting frame around them, which maximizes the mirror's surface area and ensures an unobstructed view.In conclusion, these blind spot mirrors have made a significant difference in my daily commutes. They are efficient, functional, and aesthetically pleasing while meeting expectations. They provide what I needed in a blind spot mirror and have proven to be an invaluable addition to my 2017 Chevy Volt. For those seeking to improve their driving safety and convenience, I recommend these mirrors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Different product packaging
reviews.reviewText: I've purchased these blind spot mirrors once before this second time. The first time it was same as advertised. This second time, it arrived one day earlier than it had said and the packaging for the mirrors was a different design.The blind spot mirrors themselves were the same shap but once I put them on I compared them to the first pair and the second ones were noticeably larger and more bulky than the first.Not enough of an issue to get a return in my opinion as the blind spot mirrors work well either way.So far they have stuck pretty well with no peeling as of yet.

reviews.reviewTitle: Worst buy ever for me in e commerce platform.
reviews.reviewText: Worst buy ever for me in e commerce platform... Worst quality... During the time of unboxing one mirror had fallen down and just broke instantly. And all are made of very cheap quality plastic.... In local market it's price will be maximum ₹10 each... Total price should be ₹15 to ₹20/-. That's it. I am requesting AMAZON.IN to verify the products before selling otherwise it will hamper your reputation.
